tha-ap104:0.3_0: Hearing his knowledge, the senior monks
tha-ap104:1.4_0: like an elephant with the great hermit.
tha-ap104:2.2_0: like a bull elephant filled with dung;
tha-ap104:3.2_0: one should not raise joined palms to him.
tha-ap104:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap104:5.1_0: I’m seven eons of the world,
tha-ap104:5.2_0: I was sent to death by the supreme persons.
tha-ap104:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap104:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vāsava.
tha-ap104:8.1_0: Consciousness that is well-known and famous.
